description: People must not travel beyond two kilometres from their home unless absolutely necessary.
title: Coronavirus: Leo Varadkar 'now is the time for further action'
title_page: Coronavirus: Leo Varadkar 'now is the time for further action' - BBC News
maintext: "From midnight tonight, everyone must stay at home other than to travel to and from work only when work is an essential service, to shop for food or collect a meal, to collect health or medical products, to take brief exercise as long as you adhere to physical distancing," he said.
